#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum.

== Name ==

*[SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			List of values to document a point or an area of interest on a golf course.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('tee' | 'fairway' | 'green' | 'fringe' | 'tree' | 'trees' | 'bush' | 'semi-rough' | 'rough' | 'heavy-rough' | 'trap' | 'greenside-trap' | 'fairway-trap' | 'front-water' | 'water' | 'bunker' | 'lateral-water' | 'path' | 'building' | 'obstruction' | 'out-of-bound' | 'hole-contour' | 'aim' | 'marker' | 'sprinkler' | 'other')

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CAreaOfInterest AreaOfInterest], [CPointOfInterest PointOfInterest], [CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="tee"/>    <xs:enumeration value="fairway"/>    <xs:enumeration value="green"/>    <xs:enumeration value="fringe"/>    <xs:enumeration value="tree"/>    <xs:enumeration value="trees"/>    <xs:enumeration value="bush"/>    <xs:enumeration value="semi-rough"/>    <xs:enumeration value="rough"/>    <xs:enumeration value="heavy-rough"/>    <xs:enumeration value="trap"/>    <xs:enumeration value="greenside-trap"/>    <xs:enumeration value="fairway-trap"/>    <xs:enumeration value="front-water"/>    <xs:enumeration value="water"/>    <xs:enumeration value="bunker"/>    <xs:enumeration value="lateral-water"/>    <xs:enumeration value="path"/>    <xs:enumeration value="building"/>    <xs:enumeration value="obstruction"/>    <xs:enumeration value="out-of-bound"/>    <xs:enumeration value="hole-contour"/>    <xs:enumeration value="aim"/>    <xs:enumeration value="marker"/>    <xs:enumeration value="sprinkler"/>    <xs:enumeration value="other"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
